detail_desc: Shorts in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Wide, covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, pockets in the side seams, a back pocket and raw-edge hems.
Hooded top in soft pile with dropped shoulders and a kangaroo pocket.

Sleeveless maxi dress in a crêpe weave with a low-cut back and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Tiered skirt with a concealed zip in one side. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Long cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, front pockets and slits in the sides. No buttons.
Double-layered hat in soft cotton jersey.
Straight-cut coat with a soft, brushed finish, narrow notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and welt side pockets. Unlined.

Joggers in airy cotton chambray with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the thighs and knees to create a comfortable, straight silhouette.
Suit waistcoat in woven fabric with lining fabric at the back. Buttons at the front, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and an adjustable tab at the back. Lined.
Shorts in a soft linen blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and short slits in the sides.

Double-breasted trenchcoat in an airy weave made from a modal blend with narrow notch lapels, a detachable tie belt at the waist and diagonal welt side pockets. Long sleeves with a tab and button at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Unlined.
Top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with short, lace-trimmed sleeves.
Suit waistcoat in a wool weave with a viscose back. Buttons down the front, two front pockets and an adjustable tab at the back. Lined.
All-in-one suit in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Non-wired lace bra with moulded cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Jumper in a soft, loose knit with low dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Narrow, satin-covered Alice bands.
Gilet in soft pile with a zip down the front, hood with an elasticated drawstring, zipped chest pocket and zipped side pockets. Fleece lining.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Hat in a soft knit with a decorative pompom on top, ribbed hem and earflaps. Thermal fleece lining.
T-shirts in soft jersey. The cotton content of the T-shirts is organic.
Ankle boots in crocodile-patterned imitation leather with block heels, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 10.5 cm.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Fancy dress costume with a zip down the front, hood with appliqués and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Lined triangular scarves in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Iron-on letter patch to patch and repair garments. Size approx. 9.5x10.5 cm.
Derby shoes in imitation leather with decorative seams over the toes. Patterned cotton twill linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, and front pockets.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed, stretch denim with a high waist and zip fly and button. The cotton content of the skirt is partly recycled.
Shorts in soft velour with an elasticated waist, diagonal pockets and short slits in the sides.
Soft nursing bras in organic cotton jersey with lace. Opening, lined cups with space for nursing pads, elastication under the bust and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Shaping Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with a high waist, lined gusset and half-string back. The briefs have a light shaping effect on the tummy and hips.
Trousers in a soft viscose weave with a sheen. Elasticated waist with a decorative drawstring, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Bracelets in different designs of thin metal chains. Adjustable length, approx. 19-26 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Blouse in an organic cotton weave with buttons down the front and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

Short dress in embroidered jersey with a sweetheart neckline that has gathers at the front, and short, frill-trimmed, elasticated puff sleeves. Smocking over the shoulders and at the waist, and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Push-up bras in mesh with lace details and underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short-sleeved top and a pair of leggings in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with a decorative tie detail at the front. Leggings with an elasticated waistband.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Playsuit in a patterned viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and short, wide legs.
Hipster briefs in soft cotton jersey with lace trims at the back, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Metal stud earrings in different colours.
Cycling shorts in shimmering metallic jersey. High waist with covered elastication.
Knee-length shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and patch front pockets.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Top in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a V-neck with a lace trim at the front.
Wide, straight-cut top in cotton jersey with dropped shoulders, short sleeves and a double flounce in woven fabric at the front of the hem.
Sleeveless dress in shimmering, patterned tulle with an opening and pearly button at the back of the neck. Gathered seam at the waist and hem with tiers to create width in the skirt. Lined.

Fully lined, super push-up balconette bikini top with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a metal fastener at the back.
Top in a soft, gently draping silk and cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder, lapped ribbing at the neckline and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Shorts in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, a print motif and appliqués at the back, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Metal keyring with a large faux fur pompom that has glittery ears. Length 14 cm.
Wide, ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and straight legs with a frill trim at the hems.
Hobo bag in imitation leather with a handle, detachable shoulder strap and zip at the top. One inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 10x34x34 cm.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey with a racer back.

Trunks in stretch jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and short legs. The trunks are made from COOLMAX® functional fabric, a unique, soft, comfortable and fast-drying polyester fibre that efficiently wicks moisture while regulating temperature.
Knee-length, 5-pocket skirt in washed, stretch denim with a zip fly and button and slit at the front. The skirt is made partly from recycled cotton.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front and elbow patches in a contrasting colour.

Running jacket in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and zipped chest pocket. Ventilating mesh sections in the sides and under the arms, thumbholes at the cuffs and reflective details. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Set of six face paint crayons in different colours. Weight 6x2.2 g. Not for children under 3.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with high-cut legs.

Straight-cut shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool. Ribbed neckline decorated with a metal chain at the front, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Short chiffon dress with a V-neck opening at the front, gathered yoke at the back and short, butterfly sleeves. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Satin lining.
Shorter, jacquard-patterned jersey top with dropped shoulders, a zip at the back and gathered 3/4-length ballon sleeves.
Long-sleeved jersey top with a wrapover front, long ties at the hem and overlocked edges.
Baby Exclusive. T-shirts in soft, pointelle-knit organic cotton jersey with a button placket and picot trim around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy jersey with a deep neckline at the back, seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Sleeveless dress in organic cotton jersey with a smocked seam at the waist and rounded hem.
Short, A-line skirt with buttons down the front.

Set with a bodysuit and trousers in jersey made from an organic cotton blend. Bodysuit with a sewn-on bow tie, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a sewn-on waistcoat with buttons down the front, and press-studs at the shoulders and crotch. Trousers with foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, front pockets, a fake back pocket and tapered legs with stripes down the sides.
Jumper in a soft, chunky knit containing some alpaca wool with a V-neck and low dropped shoulders. Longer at the back.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.

Jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with a V-neck front and back, narrow, frill-trimmed shoulder straps and a frill trim at the top. Decorative buttons at the front, a concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and straight, wide, calf-length legs.

Lace blouse with a stand-up collar and an opening at the back with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Wide flounces down the front that go over the shoulders and continue down the back. Long, wide sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs and a flared peplum. Lined with a V-neck top in jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
